Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
ContactsPerPage_Description: Number of contacts displayer ped page
ImportContactsLink_Description: URL of documentation page that explains structure of CSV files used
AllowAddressBooksManagement_Description: Setting to true enables managing multiple address books
AllowEditTeamContactsByTenantAdmins_Desc: Setting to true allows tenant admin to edit Team address book entries
ContactsSortBy_Description: Defines a set of rules for sorting contacts. DisplayName|Email|Frequency|FirstName|LastName
